::Magmatron/Cerberus/The Destrons::

    A plan starts to form in Magmatron=
s mind. He puts his guns away and tells Cerberus his plan, Cerberus also pu=
ts his guns away. They both transform to Beast Mode and leave the battle.
 =
   The other Destrons don't know what is going on. But they know that their=
 leaders are leaving, so they follow him.
    Cerberus watches as the Drake=
 passes over him, heading toward the Destron Base. He picks up the pace.
